186019609.review: Juegazo, apareces y te matan 7 raptores en una zona supuestamente fácil. Luego, después de morir unas 20 veces consigues tamear un pteranodón para explorar el mapa. Vas al pantano con toda la buena intención y te entra el Covid pero con mutaciones causadas por aparentes esteroides, mejor ni hablar si entras al Redwood con el ptera. Después de dejarlo por problemas psicológicos decides volver viendo tutoriales de un tal Rafita. Con eso y un impulso repentino de jugar que no va a durar ni 2 semanas empiezas a progresar, tameando dinos los cuales vas a sobreexplotar para obtener recursos y evitando morir a manos de 3 putos trodones que activan el ultrainstinto por la noche. Cuando parece que lo tienes todo hecho empiezas a recoger artefactos para matar los bosses y reproducir rexes como si fueran conejos. Vas a hacerte los jefes y te revientan porque no sabías de la existencia del Yutiranus. Al final consigues completar los bosses a duras penas y vas al volcán, se te mueren casi todos los dinos de camino al final boss y encima un Giganotosaurus te da la bienvenida a la guarida del jefe. No sabes ni tú como has sobrevivido pero consigues pasarte el juego y experimentas la mejor sensación de tu vida. Después de problemas psicológicos, 2 teclados rotos a causa de los thylacoleos y 1 mes de tu vida perdido, vuelves a ser libre y disfrutar. Sin embargo, después de librarte de esta mierda de juego te das cuenta que la historia no acaba ahí, te compras los dlcs y vuelves a la misma mierda que te ocasionaba problemas mentales. En conclusión, una obra de arte creada por los mismísimos dioses del Olimpo.

186011201.review:
ARK: Survival Evolved ist ein meisterhaftes Survival-Spiel, das dich in eine atemberaubende, offene Welt voller Dinosaurier, prähistorischer Kreaturen und endloser Abenteuer entführt. Es bietet eine unglaubliche Tiefe an Gameplay und eine immense Freiheit, die es zu einem der fesselndsten und herausforderndsten Survival-Spiele auf dem Markt macht. Vom ersten Moment an hat mich die Welt von ARK in ihren Bann gezogen, und es gibt fast immer etwas Neues zu entdecken und zu erobern.

Die größte Stärke von ARK ist zweifellos seine riesige, lebendige Welt. Die Inseln, die du erkundest, sind wunderschön und abwechslungsreich – von dichten Dschungeln über trockene Wüsten bis hin zu gefrorenen Gebirgen gibt es unzählige Umgebungen zu entdecken. Aber das wirklich Besondere an ARK ist die Interaktion mit der Tierwelt. Die Möglichkeit, Dinos zu zähmen und sie für den Kampf, den Transport oder das Sammeln von Ressourcen zu nutzen, ist einfach unglaublich. Das Zähmen eines gigantischen T-Rex oder das Reiten auf einem Flugsaurier fühlt sich einfach episch an und bietet ein einzigartiges Gefühl von Erfüllung.

Das Spiel kombiniert Überleben, Erkundung, Handwerk und Strategie auf eine Art und Weise, die es nie langweilig werden lässt. Du musst Ressourcen sammeln, deine Basis ausbauen und dich gegen die Gefahren der Welt behaupten – sei es durch wilde Tiere, andere Spieler oder Naturkatastrophen. Gleichzeitig kannst du deine Fähigkeiten verbessern und neue Technologien freischalten, die dir helfen, deinen Lebensraum weiter auszubauen und deine Überlebenschancen zu erhöhen.

Die Multiplayer-Optionen sind ein weiteres Highlight von ARK. Du kannst dich mit Freunden zusammenschließen und gemeinsam ein Reich aufbauen oder gegen andere Spieler in intensiven PvP-Kämpfen antreten. Das Spiel fördert Zusammenarbeit, aber auch den Wettbewerb, was für eine Menge Spannung sorgt. Die Gildenbildung, Raids und die Möglichkeit, riesige Tierhorden zu zähmen, bieten eine unglaubliche soziale Dimension, die ARK zu einem langanhaltenden Erlebnis macht.

Visuell ist das Spiel ebenfalls beeindruckend. Die detaillierte Umgebung und die realistische Darstellung der Dinosaurier und Tiere machen das Erkunden der Welt zu einem wahren Genuss. Die Atmosphäre, besonders bei Sonnenuntergang oder in den stürmischen Nächten, sorgt für eine packende und immersive Spielerfahrung.

Das Fortschrittssystem, das es dir ermöglicht, deine Fähigkeiten nach deinem Spielstil zu entwickeln, ist hervorragend und gibt dir das Gefühl, immer weiter zu wachsen und neue Möglichkeiten zu entdecken. Es gibt fast immer ein neues Ziel, das du erreichen kannst – sei es das Zähmen eines neuen Dinos, das Bauen einer besseren Waffe oder das Erobern eines neuen Gebiets.

Kurz gesagt: ARK: Survival Evolved ist ein episches Survival-Abenteuer, das die besten Elemente des Genres vereint. Mit seiner riesigen offenen Welt, der Vielfalt an Tieren, der Möglichkeit zur Zusammenarbeit mit anderen Spielern und der tiefgehenden Handwerks- und Fortschrittssystem bietet es ein unvergleichliches Erlebnis. Wer ein fesselndes, herausforderndes und stets spannendes Survival-Spiel sucht, wird in ARK ein wahres Meisterwerk finden.

186004826.review: This game is a beautiful master piece. 185962458.review:
ARK-Bug进化，大的小的各种bug每天都能遇到
比较恶性的：
1. 有时候玩着玩着画面突然卡死定在某一帧，无法操作，只能任务管理器关闭
2. 游戏没有存档功能，必须手动存档，游戏经常崩溃。崩溃后自动回档15分钟之前，非常破坏游戏体验
3. 游戏有莫名的bug导致有时候无法移动，包括有些岩石的缝隙之中一旦进入就一直在悬空坠落状态无法再出去。
4. 游戏几乎无引导，全靠自己摸索。
5. 游戏默认光线太亮，场景更是一片白，显示屏快闪瞎了，需要手动进行画质设置来改善。
6. 游戏主菜单音量无法调节设置，每次进入都震耳欲聋。

185806517.review:
ARK: Survival Evolved (ya da ΛRK, IPA [aɾk søɾvaɪvɯɫ ivoɫvd]), Studio Wildcard, Instict Games, Efecto Studios ve Virtual Basement işbirliğiyle geliştirilen bir aksiyon-macera hayatta kalma video oyunudur. 2017 yılının Ağustos ayında Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X ve S, Nintendo Switch, MacOS, Linux ve Mobil cihazlar için yayınlanmıştır. Oyunda oyuncular, dinozorlarla kaplı bir ıssız adada dinozorlar, diğer tarih öncesi hayvanlar, değişken hava olayları ve potansiyel bir düşman olan gerçek oyunculara karşı hayatta kalmak zorundadır.

Oyun hem birinci şahıs hem de üçüncü şahıs bakış açısından oynanabilmektedir ve oyunun serbest dünyasında yürüyerek veya bir tarih öncesi hayvan sürerek dolaşılabilinmektedir. Oyuncular kendilerini, düşman oyuncular ve yaratıklardan korumak için ateşli silahlar veya normalde silah olarak tasarlanmamış şeyler kullanabilirler. Ayrıca savunma üsleri kurma kabiliyetleri de vardır. Oyunun hem tek oyunculu hem de çok oyunculu seçenekleri vardır.

ARK: Survival Evolved (or ΛRK, IPA [aɾk søɾvaɪvɯɫ ivoɫvd]) is an action-adventure survival video game developed by Studio Wildcard, Instict Games, Efecto Studios, and Virtual Basement. It was released in August 2017 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and S, Nintendo Switch, MacOS, Linux and Mobile devices. In the game, players must survive on a desert island covered in dinosaurs against real players, including dinosaurs, other prehistoric animals, variable weather patterns, and a potential enemy.

The game can be played from both first-person and third-person perspectives, and the free world of the game can be navigated on foot or by riding a prehistoric animal. Players may use firearms or items not normally designed as weapons to protect themselves from enemy players and creatures. They also have the ability to establish defensive bases. The game has both single-player and multiplayer options.

185805959.review:
[h1][b][u]Обзор игры ARK: Survival Evolved[/u][/b][/h1]

ARK: Survival Evolved — это захватывающая многопользовательская игра в жанре выживания с элементами приключений и симуляции, разработанная студией [i]Studio Wildcard[/i]. Действие разворачивается в огромном открытом мире, где игрокам предстоит бороться за выживание среди динозавров, других доисторических существ и суровой природы.

[hr]
[h2][b]Геймплей[/b][/h2]
В начале игры вы оказываетесь на загадочном острове, где без оружия, инструментов и одежды придется добывать ресурсы, создавать предметы и строить убежище. Основные механики игры включают:  
• [i]Сбор ресурсов[/i]: Добыча древесины, камня, ягод, кожи и других материалов необходима для создания инструментов, оружия и построек.  
• [i]Приручение динозавров[/i]: Одной из главных особенностей ARK является возможность приручать более 80 видов динозавров и других существ, которые помогают в бою, транспортировке грузов или просто становятся верными спутниками.  
• [i]Крафтинг[/i]: Игроки могут создавать всё — от простых копий до высокотехнологичных устройств, таких как турели и генераторы.  
• [i]Бои и PvP[/i]: Вы можете сражаться с другими игроками или участвовать в масштабных войнах племен.

[hr]
[h3][b]Особенности[/b][/h3]
1. Реалистичная природа: Красивая графика и динамическая погода погружают в атмосферу доисторического мира.  
2. Режимы игры: ARK предлагает одиночную игру, кооператив и PvP-сервера.  
3. Эволюция технологий: От каменного века до современности с доступом к роботизированным динозаврам и футуристическим гаджетам.

[hr]
[h3][b]Плюсы[/b][/h3]
• Большой выбор динозавров и существ.  
• Интересные механики крафта и строительства.  
• Огромный открытый мир, полный загадок и опасностей.  
• Регулярные обновления и дополнения от разработчиков.

[h3][b]Минусы[/b][/h3]
• Высокие системные требования и оптимизация, которая может быть проблемной на слабых ПК.  
• Неоднозначный баланс на PvP-серверах.  
• Частые баги и проблемы с сетевым кодом.

[hr]
[h2][b]Заключение[/b][/h2]  
ARK: Survival Evolved — это уникальная игра, которая понравится любителям выживания, приключений и динозавров. Если вы готовы потратить время на приручение огромных существ, строительство базы и исследование опасного мира, то эта игра точно стоит вашего внимания. Однако будьте готовы к техническим трудностям, которые могут омрачить впечатления.

[h1][b]Оценка: 8/10[/b][/h1]

185792479.review:
"ARK: Survival Evolved" is a thrilling survival game set in a prehistoric world filled with dinosaurs and other ancient creatures. Players awaken on a mysterious island with nothing but their wits to survive against the harsh environment, natural dangers, and other players.

The game excels in its expansive open-world environment, offering a vast landscape teeming with diverse wildlife and challenging terrain to explore. The ability to tame and ride dinosaurs adds a unique dimension to gameplay, allowing for both combat and resource gathering in a dynamic ecosystem.

Graphics are a standout feature, with detailed environments and realistic creature designs that immerse players in the prehistoric setting. From lush forests to treacherous mountains and underwater depths, each location feels distinct and alive.

However, ARK is not without its challenges. The game can be notoriously difficult, especially for newcomers, requiring patience and perseverance to master its complex crafting system and survive encounters with aggressive creatures and other players in PvP (Player vs. Player) servers.

Despite these challenges, ARK offers a deeply rewarding experience for those willing to invest the time. The ability to build bases, form alliances, and engage in large-scale battles adds layers of depth that keep players coming back for more.

Overall, ARK: Survival Evolved is a must-play for fans of survival games and dinosaur enthusiasts alike, offering a richly detailed world ripe for exploration and adventure.

185754185.review: 作为沙盒生存史上最伟大游戏之一的ARK，只能说喜欢的人玩几千个小时都不腻，玩不进去的基本很早就退坑了，其原因无非就是不喜欢恐龙元素或者是游戏难度问题，这款游戏给我个人的感觉就是前期坐牢，中期最好玩，后期爽，大后期就会非常腻，一般这种时候就该换地图了，或者是玩点别的游戏缓解一下，等过段时间再继续体验会更合适，本人1000小时+，大多数时间都是自己单机，偶尔多人联机，人多其实才更好玩，当然这也得分情况，pvp很容易让人红温是真事，但是比起单机更不容易玩腻，可操作性会多很多，pve会玩的更舒服一些，在此极力推荐刚入坑或者会坑的新人们先去单机玩孤岛（island）这张初始地图熟悉一下各类操作和恐龙，即时是玩最简单的这张地图，新手前期也是最难度过的时候，坚持下来了你就是下一位大佬，撑不住那我还是劝你换别的游戏，玩游戏还是开心最重要，没必要折磨自己，但是我当初前期的时候也非常享受，因为我觉得探索新事物是最有趣的，现在的我已经逐渐套路化，感觉再也没有当初一开始的那种感觉了，虽然说我不会退坑，但是基本上也没啥新的体验了，还是祝各位玩家玩的痛快吧，痛苦并快乐着，不说了继续刷材料

185732435.review: It's not "Jurassic World" or anything like that because it's a harsh survival game set on on another world where things are vastly different and you're on your own. But then there's crafting and building, hunting and gathering, and best of all taming and riding. I suggest that you look for the whole bundle on sale to make it worth having the excellent expansions and music, and to look for a multiplayer server that isn't mental to begin with. It's a tough game from start to finish, but not for the brave and hopeful-not everything wants to eat you, but not everything's your friend. Visit "Time Safari, Inc.". It's A Sound of Thunder.

185678054.review:
Olá, equipe do Studio Wildcard!

Sou um grande fã de ARK: Survival Evolved e acompanho o desenvolvimento do jogo há algum tempo. Gostaria de sugerir uma melhoria que acredito que muitos jogadores iriam apreciar: a implementação de um launcher que permita selecionar a versão do jogo que desejamos rodar em nossos computadores.

Muitas vezes, as atualizações podem afetar o desempenho em algumas configurações de PC ou até mesmo causar incompatibilidades com mods, e seria incrível poder escolher uma versão mais estável ou uma que se ajuste melhor ao nosso sistema, sem precisar depender de métodos alternativos ou complicados.

Ter essa opção de maneira simples e prática, diretamente no launcher do jogo, permitiria uma experiência muito mais personalizada e confortável para os jogadores, além de ajudar a resolver possíveis problemas de compatibilidade com versões mais recentes.

Espero que considerem essa sugestão e agradeço pelo excelente trabalho que têm feito no ARK!

Atenciosamente,
[AMIR GOAT]




Hello, Studio Wildcard team!

I'm a huge fan of ARK: Survival Evolved and have been following the game's development for some time. I would like to suggest an improvement that I believe many players would appreciate: the implementation of a launcher that allows us to select the version of the game we want to run on our computers.

Updates can often affect performance on some PC configurations or even cause incompatibilities with mods, and it would be amazing to be able to choose a more stable version or one that fits our system better, without having to rely on alternative or complicated methods.

Having this option in a simple and practical way, directly in the game launcher, would allow a much more personalized and comfortable experience for players, as well as helping to resolve possible compatibility issues with newer versions.

I hope you consider this suggestion and thank you for the excellent work you have done on ARK!

Yours sincerely,
[AMIR GOAT]

185619626.review:
If you like survival games and the idea of riding around on dinosaurs, you're going to enjoy this. I got a little bit of time in the game, so here's my short list of helpful tips (no real spoilers):

* The PvP and PvE "balancing" and experience are _completely_ different. Don't judge the game based on only one or the other. In fact, think of the two game modes as different games altogether.

* If you want a better PvE/solo/friends only experience, do yourself and your friends a huge favor and tweak the settings as you go. The defaults are made for a PvP setup, and some of them (imo) aren't very fun or practical outside of that (i.e. waiting insanely long times and using tons of resources to tame things).

* Protect your tames. If you lose a critter, it's gone for good, and the game doesn't care how much time and effort you put into them. Yes, it's "possible" to revive a dead tame if you cheat like there's no tomorrow, but even then it's a "maybe" with risks.

* Be open-minded to mods. Even if you're normally anti-mod, when you want a fix or change to something, mods and .ini file tweaks are your only options. I've only ever used a handful of QoL mods for this game and it makes it so much better.

* Prepare for the worst at all times. I still love to play this game even though it's found unbelievable ways to screw me over more times than I can count. Your best defense against the random BS that can get you or your tames killed, or make you lose your stuff is to always be prepared. Even then, if you have any anger issues at all, no matter how minor, you should be cautious playing this game for long sessions.

* Do your research before going after boss fights. I wanted to avoid out of game info and learn as I go and trust me, boss fights are the exception. There are "rules" the game doesn't tell you, and the consequences for failing a boss fight can be devastating. You've been warned.

В детстве эта игра казалась мне очень интересной. Огромное количество различных динозавриков, много фарма во время которого можно душевно поговорить с товарищами. Ещё были различные походы, больше всего эмоций и воспоминаний у меня об кругосветных путешествиях вокруг карты на самодельном корабле. Огромная рыба могла сожрать половину судна, или крокодилы сожрать часть экипажа, а ещё были ситуации из разряда "А что это там такое? подплыви поближе" после чего нам приходилось отстреливаться от виверн из заранее подготовленных баллист.

За кучу воспоминаний и весело проведенное время, могу смело порекомендовать игру! НО с парочкой условий, вам должно быть не много лет, вам должны нравиться динозавры и самое главное, у вас должен быть минимум один друг которого можно затащить в эту игру хотя бы часов на 100

185539537.review:
основе 3 источников
ARK: Survival Evolved — многопользовательская компьютерная игра в жанре симулятора выживания. Разрабатывалась Studio Wildcard, Instinct Games, Effecto Studios и Virtual Basement.

Сюжет игры разворачивается на острове, наполненном разнообразными существами (преимущественно динозаврами) и другими потенциально враждебными игроками. Игровой процесс предполагает, что игроки должны охотиться, собирать ресурсы, создавать предметы, выращивать растения, исследовать технологии и строить укрытия для выживания.

Особенности игры:

Приручение динозавров. Для каждого вида существует свой способ приручения: хищники предпочитают мясо, травоядные — ягоды. После приручения игроки получают возможность полёта или перемещения верхом на динозавре.

Создание базы. Для этого нужно получить строительные элементы: полы, двери и окна. Игроки могут создать любую структуру, однако она может быть разрушена другими игроками.

Улучшение оружия. Собирая ресурсы, игроки приобретают возможность создать оружие, которое можно улучшить путём прикрепления обвеса, таких как дополнительные прицелы и фонарики для пистолета или автомата.

185517671.review:
Pontos Positivos

    Temática Incrível:
        A ideia de sobreviver em um mundo repleto de dinossauros e criaturas pré-históricas é extremamente cativante. A possibilidade de domar e montar essas criaturas é um dos maiores atrativos.

    Mundo Aberto e Explorável:
        ARK apresenta mapas imensos e visualmente impressionantes. Com diversas expansões, os cenários variam de ilhas tropicais a mundos alienígenas.

    Domesticação de Criaturas:
        Domar dinossauros não é apenas divertido, mas também estratégico, pois cada criatura tem suas próprias habilidades e utilidades, seja para transporte, combate ou coleta de recursos.

    Construção e Personalização:
        O jogo permite construir bases de todos os tamanhos, desde pequenas cabanas até fortalezas massivas, oferecendo criatividade para os jogadores.

    Multiplayer e Comunidade:
        O multiplayer é uma experiência única. Jogar com amigos ou em servidores PvP adiciona camadas de estratégia, diplomacia e conflito.

    Conteúdo Extensivo:
        Com diversas expansões como Scorched Earth, Aberration, Extinction, e Genesis, o jogo oferece centenas (ou milhares) de horas de conteúdo.

Pontos Negativos

    Performance e Otimização:
        ARK é notoriamente mal otimizado. Mesmo em PCs e consoles de alta performance, os jogadores enfrentam quedas de FPS, bugs gráficos e tempos de carregamento demorados.

    Curva de Aprendizado Íngreme:
        O jogo tem muitos sistemas e mecânicas complexas que não são bem explicadas para iniciantes. Isso pode ser intimidador para novos jogadores.

    Grind Excessivo:
        Muitas atividades, como domesticação de criaturas e coleta de recursos, podem ser extremamente demoradas, especialmente em servidores com taxas padrão.

    Problemas no Multiplayer:
        No PvP, bases podem ser destruídas enquanto você está offline, o que pode ser frustrante. Além disso, hackers e jogadores tóxicos podem arruinar a experiência em servidores públicos.

    Microtransações e DLCs:
        Embora o jogo base ofereça muito conteúdo, algumas expansões essenciais são pagas. Isso pode ser visto como negativo para quem já pagou pelo jogo principal.

    AI Limitada:
        A inteligência artificial das criaturas e inimigos é bastante básica, o que pode gerar comportamentos estranhos e frustrantes em algumas situações.


Para Quem o Jogo é Indicado

    Fãs de sobrevivência e crafting: ARK é um prato cheio para quem gosta de coletar recursos, construir bases e personalizar o ambiente.
    Amantes de dinossauros: O jogo é um sonho para quem cresceu fascinado por dinossauros e criaturas pré-históricas.
    Jogadores com amigos: ARK é muito mais divertido no modo cooperativo. Jogar sozinho pode ser uma experiência solitária e desgastante.


Para Quem Pode Não Ser Ideal

    Jogadores casuais: Se você busca algo para jogar rapidamente, ARK não é o ideal. É um jogo que exige muito tempo e dedicação.
    Quem preza por performance: Se você não gosta de lidar com bugs, quedas de FPS e má otimização, o jogo pode ser frustrante.
    Quem não gosta de grind: O ritmo do jogo, especialmente em servidores oficiais, pode ser lento demais para alguns.


Conclusão

ARK: Survival Evolved é uma experiência única e ambiciosa, mas não é perfeita. Para jogadores que conseguem olhar além de seus problemas técnicos e estão dispostos a investir tempo, o jogo pode proporcionar aventuras incríveis. No entanto, quem busca algo mais refinado e menos frustrante pode se decepcionar.

185454028.review:
Арк буквально олицетворяет Вальхейм, множество проблем, включая огромное количество багов, которые не просто меняют текстуры или выкидывают из них, но реальноо мешают прогрессу в игре,
Интерфейс оставляет желать лучшего, а интеллект динозавров можно охарактеризовать как пустышку, застревают в текстурах, виснут в воздухе и телепортируются по деревьям,
Особенно разочаровывает баланс в этой легендарной игре. медведь 24 уровня по силе и ловкости сравним с тираннозавром 30 уровня. если и повезёт, то медведь ушатает тираннозавра
А если решишь поиграть по сети,
то столкнёшься с настоящим испытаниям: подключение к хосту может занять до 30 минут и это если игра не вылетит в процессе запуска
Всебы ничего, если не думать что игра вышла в 2015 году. Прошло столько времени, а баги и отсутствие оптимизации попрежнему есть
Баланс тоже оставляет желать лучшего. Зато в игре есть додо

I'm writing this review mainly to preserve the memory. 

When I first started playing this game it was like around 5 years ago- I played with two other friends. They were talking about taming dodo birds, and I wanted to know how to do that, so I asked them. They told me to beat the dodo bird up, and then feed it. I beat up the dodo bird (unknowingly to its death), before trying to feed it. It stayed limp. I picked it up and headed back to my friends- still clueless that I had accidentally killed it. 

Safe to say, we had a good laughing fit over the whole situation, even today. 

Overall grindy, but good game.

185356822.review:
Подумал, что поделюсь этим как есть (во всяком случае, в моем сознании) Забавная история неумелости и ужасного везения. (сначала играю в одиночку, чтобы привыкнуть к механике)

Жизнь 1. Появился на пляже, когда экран гас, я услышал странный звук, почти как будто кто-то хрюкает и что-то ест мясо поблизости, сигнал фактически получил контроль над моим игроком, и я подвергся атаке примерно 5-6 игроков, естественно, поскольку я совершенно новичок, я запаниковал и побежал за деревья, только чтобы увидеть хищника, смотрящего на меня, поэтому я развернулся на 180 градусов и нырнул в океан, молясь, чтобы они не умели плавать, успеха! вроде как компи и раптор все сидят и наблюдают за мной в течение 2-3 секунд, которые требуются мегалодону, чтобы подойти и съесть меня.

Жизнь 2, Возрожден на пляже, но, к счастью, не в том самом месте, ударил кулаком по дереву, построил свою первую кирку, был атакован compy's, убежал, увидел одну из этих ядовитых штуковин, не знал, что это было, пока она не проделала всю эту штуку с вилянием шеей в парке юрского периода, она плюнула, ударила меня, ослепила, продолжал бежать, случайно попал в море, съеденный мегапиранами (прошу прощения за ужасное написание)

Жизнь 3, возрождение динозавра не планируется, поэтому я собираю немного ресурсов и добываю большой камень, оказывается, за камнем был хищник, поэтому, когда он исчезает, хищник замечает обед.

Жизнь 4, появляюсь в основном в моем старом теле, и раптор быстро убивает и съедает меня снова.

Жизнь 5, возрождение довольно близко к смерти 3 и 4, так что убегай, к сожалению, слева от меня хищник, а справа плевательница, и я узнал, что океан - это смерть, поэтому я бегу в джунгли, чтобы спрятаться на деревьях, теряю раптора и плевательницу, и когда я начинаю пробираться к пляжу, я внезапно умираю, так и не увидев нападавшего, убитый подлой птицей-ужасом.

Жизнь 6, возрождение в безопасной зоне, не торопись, сделай кое-что, дела идут хорошо, сделал несколько копий и даже сразился с могучим дронтом и победил его! разделываю дронта на обед и замечаю бегущего на меня травоядного динозавра, я отхожу в сторону и замечаю преследующего его хищника прямо за ним, который затем решает напасть на меня, каким-то образом сбил его копьем, но я сам почти мертв, поэтому я решаю съесть немного ягод, чтобы посмотреть, заживут ли они. К сожалению, я нажал использовать не тот предмет и вместо вкусного обеда из ягод съел человеческие фекалии, которые отравили меня и прикончили. Да, это верно - пережил хищника, совершив самое ужасное из когда-либо совершенных самоубийств.

Жизнь 7. Возрождаюсь на приличном расстоянии и замечаю небольшой остров неподалеку с большим светящимся лучом с неба, подсвечивающим что-то вращающееся, мне становится очень любопытно, и я заползаю в воду. Я оглядываюсь, ничего поблизости не вижу, поэтому решаю рискнуть, я нахожусь примерно в 10 метрах от берега, когда получаю урон, и, прежде чем я успеваю отреагировать, я мертв, убитый Мантой.

Жизнь 8, все идет очень хорошо, по крайней мере, за 20 минут смертей нет, замечаю вдалеке дронта и пытаюсь метнуть копье на дальнюю дистанцию (без перекрестия прицела), к сожалению, из-за большого камня рядом с ним выходит трицератопс как раз вовремя, чтобы поймать копье в ногу, что, по понятным причинам, немного расстроило его. Я по глупости не двинулся с места, всадил копье ему в морду и попытался увернуться в последнюю секунду, как матадор. Не сработало, он развернулся вместе со мной и протаранил меня, отбросив назад, чтобы приземлиться в океане и быть немедленно съеденным, но уже другим мегалодоном.
10 Trex / 10...

I love this game, it's beautiful, this should be more popular than it is, and we can only wonder if this game had fixed it's horrible issues like optimisation, and possibly remove developers which have some screws loose. 185319293.review:
"I honestly don’t even know where to start—this game has been such an incredible experience from the very beginning. I was completely drawn in the moment I started playing, and it’s kept me hooked ever since. The gameplay is so engaging, the design is absolutely stunning, and the little surprises around every corner just make it impossible to put down. Every aspect of this game feels so thoughtfully crafted, from the way the world feels alive to the unique mechanics that keep things fresh and exciting.

What really stands out to me is how much variety there is. Whether I’m exploring, solving challenges, or diving into the story, there’s always something new and fun to discover. It’s one of those rare games where time seems to fly by because you’re just so absorbed in it. I’ve caught myself thinking about it even when I’m not playing—whether it’s strategizing my next move, remembering an amazing moment, or just appreciating how much fun it is.

I also love how it gives you the freedom to play your own way. It’s immersive without being overwhelming and always leaves me wanting to see what’s next. It’s honestly one of the most enjoyable and memorable gaming experiences I’ve had in a long time. I’m so glad I gave it a try because it’s brought me so much joy, excitement, and entertainment. It’s one of those games that I know I’ll be recommending to people for a long time!"

Need. Beefy. Computer. Fun, but a bit buggy. Takes a lot of space, espesially with DLCs. As with many of my reviews, most of the downsides are just that the game takes a lot of space, or needs a good computer, which isn't always the fault of the game developers, but it can suck a bit. But again, as with most of my reviews, I will list those downside, but then rate the game on its own. The big thing with ARK is just how buggy it is due to just how much stuff the game has to simulate. But most of these bugs aren't game breaking, and I tend to find myself laughing at it more often then not.

Overall, the gameplay on it's own is an 8.5/10 but I have to drag the overall rating down to 7/10 just due to how much space it takes up and that you need a beefy PC. But if you have that, I'd recommend this game.

185152977.review:
After more than 540 hours playing ARK: Survival Evolved, what I liked the most is the feeling of freedom and exploration that the game offers. The possibility of taming prehistoric creatures, building bases and surviving in a hostile world is really addictive. However, one of the aspects I liked the least is the difficulty curve, which can become very steep, especially when facing more experienced players or on servers with very strict rules. Also, technical errors and server crashes can ruin the experience at key moments.

As for whether I would recommend it, I would, but with caveats. It's an amazing game for those who enjoy challenges and open world, but it can be frustrating for those looking for a more relaxed experience or without too many technical hiccups.

With the huge diversity, however, in play styles, the settings with the dlcs, etc, all of the options presented are pretty good ones.  Quality of life changes, and cosmetic stuff make the game fun even after you've played it before.  There's lots of info online to make the game easier as well.

185067106.review: Ark: Survival Evolved offers a thrilling survival experience, letting you tame dinosaurs and build your own world in a hostile environment. The vast open world, filled with prehistoric creatures and harsh challenges, keeps you engaged for hours. The multiplayer aspect adds a competitive edge as you form alliances or wage war against other survivors. If you enjoy open-world survival games with a massive sense of freedom, Ark delivers in spades.

185031585.review:
Ark holds a special place in my childhood, serving as a vibrant backdrop to countless adventures and cherished moments. The immersive world of Ark, with its stunning landscapes and diverse creatures, captivated my imagination and transported me to a realm where anything was possible. Engaging with the game evokes a wealth of fond memories, each one a snapshot of laughter, excitement, and camaraderie.

The experience of playing alongside friends significantly enhances the enjoyment of the game. Together, we would strategize, explore, and conquer challenges, forging bonds that extended beyond the screen. The thrill of taming dinosaurs, building elaborate bases, and surviving the elements was magnified by the shared joy of teamwork and collaboration. Each session was filled with spontaneous moments of hilarity and triumph, creating a tapestry of experiences that I hold dear.

Ark is not just a game to me; it is a cherished part of my upbringing, a source of nostalgia that reminds me of simpler times spent with friends. The memories we created while navigating the vast landscapes and facing the dangers of the wild are etched in my mind, making this game truly beloved to me. It represents a unique blend of adventure, friendship, and creativity that continues to resonate with me long after those childhood days have passed.

184972813.review:
A game that does not want to be played: unpolished, laggy, at times slow and cluncky, but has dinosaurs so it balances out that stuff.

The best way to play is obviously with QoL mods due to a lot of junk that could be trimmed out and don't know if it is right now. Without mods is highly advisable to change the settings and parameters of the game (a feature that i love) to make everything more fluid.

The absurd part is the size, not the maps, the gigabytes and PC necessary to play this abomination: I heard once that the original version of ARK was made in about 9 month, which it shows, but i feel that thay didn't make any improvements during the years.

If you have time to spend and a buffed up PC you'll enjoy it, mind having patience or a guide to help you.

Not only the graphics but also the art direction is a stand out to me, the Tek stuff is pretty well mixed with the ancient look of the places.
The dlcs are cool too.
Still i don't understand making a remaster/remake of ARK without making actually better.

184878461.review:
Game isn't all that fun. I had to tweak the settings a lot so that I wasn't constantly dying or having my dinosaurs killed. After getting the settings better, it's more of a walking/farming simulator than anything else. I don't mind gathering resources and building things up over time, but the weight system makes it a complete chore. If you carry too much you can't move, so you have to carefully manage your weight on your character and on the dinos,and once you get those resources back to your base, you also have to make sure not to overload your inventory when transferring the resources from your dinos to your storage, and it's a lot of back and forth until your dinos are empty.

it's not worth the 200+ GB of hard drive space anyway. Not recommended.

I am curious of where the story, the gameplay experiences, and the new maps go from this game.

184874811.review:
This game is probably one of the best games ever, but there are some things to consider before buying it.
1. No official servers - There are no more official servers after the release of its UE5 version (ARK: Survival Ascended). Only unofficial servers remain.
2. Dead Game - There are only a few servers left, which have active players
3. It's addicting - Once you find yourself a good server, you can't stop playing this game. Therefore be careful if you value your time ;)

Therefore I would recommend you the following:
If you have a really good PC, buy ARK: Survival Ascended instead.
If your PC is not that good, you should definetly give ARK: Survival Evolved a try as it is basically the same game with a little less features and worse graphics.

184764308.review:
Running up a snowy mountain firing a machine gun at a woolly mammoth from the back of a tyrannosaurus is a fantastic example of the reason many video games exist: living out ridiculous childhood fantasies. ARK: Survival Evolved has plenty of that to go around across its multiple sprawling maps - which it calls ARKs - which can be explored solo or crowded with up to 100 players. Some lingering technical issues, bad dino AI, and an extreme amount of grinding to reach endgame are the main factors keeping it from being as sharp in the tooth as it could be.

Like many of the survival/crafting games of the genre it partially helped popularize, ARK dumps you on the beaches of a massive, foreboding island with just enough clothing to stay modest and your own two fists. From there, the challenge is to stay fed and hydrated while avoiding a huge variety of terrifyingly detailed dinosaurs and other beasts long enough to progress up the tech tree. Early in the life of a character, you might be taking out dilophosaurs with throwing spears and hoping a triceratops doesn’t come and knock your thatch hut over in the middle of the night.

184724332.review:
不推荐购买焦土，这个图现在也没什么存在意义，特殊资源仙人掌，蠕虫角。沙虫，石头人，飞龙，螳螂等特殊生物别的图都有刷新，甚至连BOSS别的图都有，现在也只有特别无聊的人才会跑到焦土抓凤凰，这也是个吉祥物，麻烦又没用。所以之后的DLC特有物种基本都不会出现在免费地图了。
畸变是所有图中我觉得最好玩的，萌新时期畸变开荒简直爱了。
灭绝现在来说空投脉矿泰坦也是一种玩法，但不是必要的了，创世两个图一个代替空投，一个代替脉矿，可以玩玩。
最关键的还是创世两个图，如果预算不够建议只买季票
开荒建议仙境，我开荒从来都是仙境。
总之预算不够就买本体加创世
硬盘不够的话， 创世纪＞畸变＞灭绝＞焦土
免费的 仙境＞瓦尔＞水晶岛＞中心岛
以上PVE 个人建议

184701954.review:
I got pregnant. 10/10.

Has some bugs. Could use some work.

I think pregnancy is wonderful. I know it's not all lollipops and rainbows. I supported my wife every single day through her pregnancy and I helped her through the nausea, the body aches, and the terrible pain of giving birth. I know there are risks and complications and it's not something everyone wants to do. I wish I could do it, though. My wife and I agreed we wanted a baby as soon as we had a house. Thankfully, she was able to become pregnant (I really feel for the women who can't have babies and wish they could) and we now have a toddler who is an absolute joy. She loved being pregnant. Every day we talked about the baby growing in her womb that we couldn't wait to meet. I kissed her belly hundreds of times. And I fell in love with her all over again every time I looked at her. Her hand was pretty much glued to her belly, always rubbing it and humming a song. The bond that is formed between the mother and child is simply beautiful. The hardest part about it is that I'll never be able to realize this wish and I never had a choice in the matter. Women can choose (in most cases) whether or not they want to become pregnant. And I don't know how the logistics of it all would work, anyway. Maybe if we lived in a world where both men and women were built with the capability to have babies, kind of like seahorses. I know it's not realistic, but if it were possible to give me a uterus transplant I'd consider it. I would go through considerable pain and effort if it meant I could get pregnant. Every guy I've ever told has either looked at me like I'm insane or just straight-up laughed at me. Women I've told seem to understand, but nobody really takes it seriously except for my wife. She knows it's not a joke and that it's an actual dream of mine. Any guys out there agree with me? Edit: Some people are rightfully pointing out that my wife's pregnancy went smoothly and that we are very fortunate. I do not disagree. However, I disagree that I have an idealized view of pregnancy. Just because things went well for her does not mean they would for me and does not mean they go well for others, but it also does not invalidate my feelings. As I stated above, I am well-informed of the risks that come with pregnancy. Edit 2: No, it's not a sexual thing. Also, to clarify, I am happy as a straight male and I do not want to transition to become a woman.

184698120.review: 《方舟：生存进化》是一款极具挑战性和探索性的沙盒游戏。游戏中，玩家被放置在一个充满恐龙和其他史前生物的岛屿上，需要从零开始建造家园、收集资源、驯服生物，并与其他玩家互动。游戏的自由度极高，玩家可以自由选择生存方式，无论是独自生存还是与其他玩家合作建立部落。丰富的生态系统和多样的生物种类为游戏增添了无限乐趣，但同时也需要玩家付出大量的时间和精力去探索和学习。总体来说，《方舟：生存进化》是一款值得投入时间的优秀游戏，适合喜欢探险和生存挑战的玩家.

184638688.review:
A good game that takes up WAY, WAY TOO much space.

++ An open-world survival-craft
++ With DINOSAURS you can TAME
++ And future tech
++ Highly customizeable gameplay and difficulty. Was the first open-world game I knew that did this.
++ The first map (Island) is quite good. It was fun to explore and it and felt mysterious.
++ Mods can improve the core game experience quite a lot

-- Very buggy
-- The combat is not that fun. Death comes quickly and is expensive and frustrating.
-- Huuuuge
-- None of the extra maps have grabbed me. I haven't tried the Genesis maps yet.
-- Playable single-player, but not in a very balanced or fun way so far. Mods do improve this.

== Overall a pretty good game with some annoying design decisions, most of which you can work around with mods. Expect to dedicate [b]500GB+[/b] if you get all the maps though!

184582141.review:
ARK: Survival Evolved is the ultimate test of survival skills... and patience. Stranded on a mysterious island filled with dinosaurs, you’ll craft, build, tame, and occasionally scream as a T-Rex turns your cozy base into rubble.

The mix of survival mechanics and dino-taming is wildly addictive. One minute you’re foraging for berries, the next you’re riding a raptor into battle. The graphics are gorgeous (when the game behaves), but the grind for resources and the frequent bugs can test even the most dedicated players.

ARK is chaotic, frustrating, and ridiculously fun. 8/10, would lose my dino to a random alpha again.

184576666.review:
ARK: Survival Evolved became one of my all-time favorite games because it offers a perfect blend of adventure, survival, exploration, and strategy. The world is massive and filled with diverse biomes, from jungles to tundras. Exploring ARK is exciting, always offering something new to discover, whether it’s a rare creature or hidden cave.

A huge part of what makes ARK enjoyable is its creature taming system. The game features a vast array of creatures—dinosaurs, mammals, reptiles, and mythical creatures—that can be tamed, raised, and trained. Tracking, taming, and raising them became a rewarding challenge that was crucial to my survival.

The multiplayer experience in ARK took the game to another level. Teaming up with friends or joining a tribe created a sense of collaboration. We gathered resources, built bases, tamed creatures, and defended against threats. PvP gameplay added intense moments, making every session unpredictable and exciting.

Another aspect I enjoyed was the crafting and building mechanics. The game lets you gather resources to craft everything from tools to advanced gear. The crafting system feels immersive, and progressing from basic tools to high-tech weapons was incredibly satisfying. Building structures gave me the freedom to design and fortify bases, adding a creative strategic element.

Surviving in ARK means managing hunger, thirst, stamina, and health, along with environmental hazards. Planning ahead and gathering food and resources was key to survival. Whether I was hunting, finding shelter, or avoiding extreme temperatures, these survival elements kept me constantly engaged.

Progression in ARK kept me hooked. As I leveled up, new abilities and crafting recipes unlocked, making the game feel rewarding. The progression system was tied to time and effort, and each milestone felt like an achievement. The game’s depth ensured that I was always striving for something new.

Finally, the vast amount of content in ARK kept the experience fresh. With expansion packs introducing new creatures and biomes, there was always something new to explore. It’s a game that rewards creativity, adaptability, and persistence, making each session an adventure worth undertaking.

In conclusion, ARK is an immersive, challenging, and rewarding game. The combination of exploration, creature taming, crafting, and multiplayer interaction made it endlessly fun. The expansive world and sense of progression kept me coming back for more, always ready for the next adventure.

184465418.review:
ARK: Survival Evolved – De “dinossauros épicos” a “museu jurássico da frustração”

Jogar ARK por 9 anos é como estar em um relacionamento longo: no início, tudo é empolgante e cheio de descobertas, mas com o tempo, as coisas começam a perder o brilho, e você se pergunta se ainda vale a pena continuar ou se é melhor seguir em frente e explorar novos horizontes.

ARK começou como um sonho para os fãs de dinossauros e sobrevivência. Era você, uma ilha cheia de criaturas pré-históricas e aquele desafio constante de não ser comido, esmagado ou picado por algo maior ou mais rápido que você. Passava horas coletando recursos, domando criaturas, construindo bases gigantes que mais pareciam obras de arte e, claro, chorando quando um T-Rex destruidor resolvia transformar sua base em um tapete de madeira e tijolos.

Mas os anos passaram, e ARK ficou... velho. Não aquele "velho clássico que você revisita com carinho", mas o "velho desgastado que tenta parecer novo com um chapéu diferente". As novidades começaram a minguar, e o que era para ser um jogo em constante evolução agora parece mais uma série repetitiva de eventos reciclados e mecânicas ultrapassadas. E os bugs? Ah, esses são os fósseis mais constantes do jogo!

Depois de quase uma década, é difícil não sentir que ARK se tornou um dinossauro metafórico: grande, lento, e meio preso no passado. Talvez a magia tenha sumido porque o jogo já entregou tudo o que podia, ou talvez seja o cansaço de ver as mesmas mecânicas pintadas com uma nova camada de verniz. Seja como for, jogar ARK hoje é como visitar uma exposição de dinossauros em um museu. Ainda é impressionante, mas a emoção não é a mesma de quando tudo era novidade.

Talvez seja hora de colocar o pterodáctilo no hangar e buscar aventuras em novos jogos. Quem sabe, um dia, a Wildcard traga algo realmente inovador para a franquia. Mas, por enquanto, ARK parece destinado a ser um capítulo nostálgico na vida dos jogadores – um capítulo que, para muitos, já foi fechado.

ARK-Очень неплохая игра даже несмотря на то что багов тут много и вылетов(но за все 790 часов  у меня особо багов,вылетов не было.)                                                                                                                                                 
    Дополнения тут очень хорошие,например Adderation , Genesis 2 и Genesis.                              
     Теперь по сюжету сюжет тут очень хороший но подают ее очень плохо через тонны записок и ради сюжета лучше сразу идти на youtube.  Графика очень хорошая особенно для 2017 года .В ней всегда можно найти что-то новое если не играть на одной и той-же карте .Эту игру можно назвать одним из лучших  Выживаний (кроме Valheym) в который я играл.Но разработчики моральные уроды что закрыли официальные сервера и выпустили донатную версию Asentent(или ARK 1.5). В целом игру можно и нужно покупать в  2024(ну или уже 2025 без разницы особой)                                                                                                    . P.S Не играйте на временных серверах и не "Рейдите" их или тогда игра будет весить НАМНОГО больше например как у меня 395 гб

184260665.review:
ARK: Survival Evolved is an action-adventure survival game developed by Studio Wildcard, originally released in 2017. Set in an open-world environment populated by dinosaurs, prehistoric creatures, and other dangerous wildlife, ARK combines elements of exploration, crafting, and combat in a world where players must fight to survive. The game can be played solo or with others in multiplayer modes, offering a variety of experiences depending on the playstyle.

Gameplay Mechanics

At its core, ARK: Survival Evolved is about surviving on a hostile island inhabited by dinosaurs and other creatures. Players begin with nothing but their bare hands and must gather resources like wood, stone, and fiber to craft tools, build shelters, and create weapons. As players progress, they can tame dinosaurs, which range from small, non-threatening herbivores to massive, terrifying carnivores. The tamed creatures become invaluable companions, helping with tasks like gathering resources, defending your base, and even fighting other players or wild animals.

Survival in ARK is a multi-faceted challenge. Players must manage hunger, thirst, and health, while also dealing with the constant threat of hostile creatures, both wild and human-controlled. Crafting plays a huge role, as you'll need to gather materials to build bases, weapons, and armor to protect yourself from environmental dangers and other players. The complexity of the crafting system is one of the game's strengths, allowing for a great deal of customization and strategy in how players approach survival.

Taming Dinosaurs

One of ARK’s most unique features is the ability to tame dinosaurs. Taming creatures involves knocking them unconscious and feeding them specific foods, such as berries, meat, or special kibble, depending on the creature. Each species has its own taming requirements and behaviors, making the process more complex than just feeding and waiting. Tamed dinosaurs can be used for a variety of purposes, such as transportation, gathering resources, or combat. The diversity of creatures, from flying pterodactyls to massive T. rex, adds a layer of depth and excitement to the gameplay.

Taming can be a time-consuming process, especially with larger or more dangerous creatures, but the payoff is significant. A powerful tamed dinosaur can make survival much easier, whether by helping with resource gathering or serving as a formidable mount in battle. The taming process is rewarding, but it does require patience and strategy.

Crafting and Building

The crafting and building system in ARK is extensive. Players can gather a wide variety of materials, such as wood, metal, and crystal, to create tools, weapons, and structures. As you progress, you'll unlock more advanced blueprints, allowing you to craft increasingly powerful items like guns, advanced armor, and large-scale buildings. Bases can be constructed from a variety of materials, and they can be customized to suit the player’s needs, whether they are protecting resources, housing dinosaurs, or acting as a fortified stronghold.

The building system also allows for creativity, as players can design bases in any way they see fit. The ability to build large structures, including walls, turrets, and traps, adds depth to the survival mechanics. However, building can be time-consuming, and defending your base from other players or hostile creatures requires preparation and foresight.

Multiplayer and Community

ARK is primarily designed as a multiplayer experience, and much of its appeal comes from playing with others. Players can join official or unofficial servers, where they can cooperate with other survivors, form tribes, and participate in large-scale battles. Tribes allow players to share resources, tamed dinosaurs, and items, making it easier to survive and progress. Tribe dynamics are crucial, as cooperation is often the key to survival in ARK.

PvP (Player versus Player) is a significant part of ARK's multiplayer experience. In PvP servers, players can raid other tribes, steal resources, and engage in all-out warfare using their tamed dinosaurs and crafted weapons. While this can lead to thrilling moments of excitement, it also means that players can be constantly at risk of being attacked by others. PvE (Player versus Environment) servers are also available for those who prefer a more cooperative and less competitive experience.

The multiplayer aspect can be both rewarding and frustrating. While cooperation can lead to powerful alliances, the constant threat of betrayal, griefing, and raiding can also create tension within the player community. For many, this unpredictability is part of the game’s appeal, but it can also be a source of frustration for those who prefer a more peaceful gameplay experience.

Graphics and World Design

Visually, ARK: Survival Evolved offers stunning environments that range from dense jungles and rocky cliffs to desert wastelands and frozen tundras. The game’s world is vast and filled with different biomes, each with its own ecosystem and challenges. Dinosaurs, creatures, and environmental effects like weather and day-night cycles are well-designed, contributing to the immersion of the game.

However, the graphics have some mixed reception. While the environments and creatures are impressive, the game can sometimes feel unpolished, with occasional texture pop-ins, glitches, or frame rate drops, especially on older hardware or when a lot of players and creatures are present in the same area. While regular updates have addressed some of these issues, ARK's technical performance is still a concern for many players.

Challenges and Learning Curve

ARK: Survival Evolved is known for its steep learning curve. New players are often thrown into a harsh world with little guidance, which can make the game feel overwhelming at first. However, as players learn the ropes and understand the mechanics of taming, crafting, and survival, the game becomes more rewarding. The game’s depth is one of its strongest features, but it also requires patience and perseverance.

Survival can feel punishing at times. Losing a tamed dinosaur, having your base raided, or being killed by a predator after hours of effort can be discouraging. The game requires players to think ahead, plan strategically, and be ready to adapt to changing circumstances. This level of challenge makes success in ARK feel incredibly rewarding, but it can also be a source of frustration for those looking for a more relaxed experience.

Conclusion

ARK: Survival Evolved is a deep and immersive survival game that offers a unique blend of exploration, crafting, combat, and dinosaur taming. Its open-world design, variety of creatures, and focus on multiplayer make it a thrilling experience for players who enjoy survival games with a high degree of freedom. However, the game’s technical issues, steep learning curve, and reliance on online multiplayer can be barriers for some players.

For those willing to invest time and effort into learning the mechanics and dealing with occasional frustrations, ARK offers a rewarding and expansive survival experience unlike any other. Whether you're taming dinosaurs, building massive bases, or engaging in thrilling battles with other players, ARK: Survival Evolved provides a vast and challenging world to explore and survive in.

184202337.review:
Früher war es einer meiner meist gezockten Spiele, da ich Autoball bei TV total schon immer inspiriert hat. Aber leider muss ich heutzutage einiges dafür büßen u.a bei den Teameinteilungen.

Leider weiß das Spiel nicht wie gut einer ist und teilt mich mit Leuten ein die Rund um die Uhr Non-Stop dieses Ding zocken. 0:6 in nur 2 Minuten... klar, voll fair. Gegner sind meistens irgendwelche Turniersieger bei was auch immer und ich bekomm Leute die auf meinem oder noch niedrigerer Spielleistung sind. Auch bekomm ich zu 99% inkompetente Mitspieler die einen selbst fast nie an den Ball lassen oder ehrgeizig Single, duo oder trippleplay betreiben. Super 'Teamplay' an der Stelle. 

Auch ist zu bedenken das z.B in Wärmesucher es verboten werden sollte einen zu zerstören weil man dann erkennen kann wie Provokant und machtsüchtig so manche auch sein können.

Lächerlich finde ich auch die zwanglosen-Playlisten... ein Update wo 'zwanglos' nicht mehr zu sagen ist, nein. Es wird jetzt genauso wie in Rangkämpfen mit einer 'Abstimmung' dafür gesorgt, dass man bei unfairen Einteilungen, nicht mehr aus dem Spiel gehen kann wann man möchte. Früher war es kein Problem aber jetzt wird auf einmal auch in den zwanglosen Playlisten bei mehreren 'unerlaubten' Schließen der Verbindung zeitbegrenzt gebannt. Und es wird gesagt das dann anscheinend ein unfairer Nachteil für mein Team entstehen könnte... What? Unterzahl gibt es nicht einmal da leere Plätze von COMs besetzt werden. Wo soll da ein unfairer Nachteil bestehen? Und wie schon oben erwähnt gibt es bei mir zu 99% nur inkompetente Teams... da ist von keinem unfairem Nachteil zu sprechen. Wenn man Aufgibt zählt diese Partie nämlich als verloren aber so will niemand zumindest ich nicht verlieren... daher umgehe ich die Abstimmung damit diese Partie nicht gezählt wird versuch eine fairere Einteilung zu bekommen. So wie jetzt vorgegangen wird, könnt ihr die zwanglosen Playlisten ja direkt abschaffen und diese Bestimmungen sind ja echt nur erbärmlich.

Keine Ahnung, warum man so eine lange Bewertung über Rocket League schreibt, aber Ark ist eigentlich ganz Nice.

184155601.review:
This game is absolute trash. Nothing is optimized; what do I mean by that?

1. Graphics are terrible, even on a Radeon 6800 series graphics card with optimized settings
2. My biggest issue so far, items completely disappear from your inventory when transferring from a chest
3. Setting up a coop game and managing server settings is way too complicated
4. Story is pretty subpar. I've only played a couple hours on this account, but on my other account where i've put almost 50 hours into it, I was not impressed one bit with how everything progressed
5. You also get no direction on how stuff works; no proper tutorial or game tips that are actually useful, and the lists of materials to build something don't even pop up sometimes
6. And finally, to end off all of this, it says it's verified for Steam Deck but when my wife and tried it, nothing works properly! Stuff glitches, disappears, and shows up in the wrong places way too often. 

I don't care at all that this is a cult classic, I could not recommend this game to save my life.

184145461.review:
Решил написать обзор на эту игру спустя 2к часов. (Кроме стима еще играл в эпике и на консоли)
Я поставил палец вверх, но на самом деле рекомендовать игру всем я не буду, постараюсь расписать плюсы и минусы, а вы уж сами решайте. 
МИНУСЫ
1. Игра очень недружелюбна к новичкам. Обучение в игре реализовано плохо, так что вам во многих аспектах придется полагаться на себя, смотреть видосы,читать в инете и т.п. 
В этом плане лучше всего играть с прошаренным другом, тогда игра пойдет куда веселее. 
Если друзей, играющих в нее у вас нет, найдите хороший ПВЕ сервер, вступите к кому-нибудь в трайб и играйте с ними. Игра заточена по мультиплеер, поэтому играть вместе всегда веселее. 
2. Если вы любите сюжетные игры, АРК скорее всего не для вас. Сюжет тут классный, но подается он из рук вон плохо. Вы должны собирать сотни заметок, и как то сами разобраться в канве истории. Короче, за сюжетом лучше идите сразу на ютуб.
3. АРК все еще довольно глючная игра. Конечно, именно эта версия (сравниваю с Ascended)  куда стабильнее, но вылеты все же происходят в совершенно случайные моменты. И вот, представьте, вы 2-3 часа лазили по опасным местам,собирали лут и ресы. Несете все на базу и ХРЕНАСЬ! игры вылетела. Пока вы перезаходили, вас кто-то убил и вы все потеряли. Такое с вами случится не раз. А если ситуация произойдет во время битвы с боссом, то вы лишитесь либо клавы, либо моника, короче, вы точно что-то разобьете. 
4. ПВП режим. Суть АРКа в том, что в ПВП, если сносят вашу базу,вы чаще лишаетесь всего и начинаете с голой жопой на пляже. На некоторых серверах есть исключения, но в основном так. Если вы готовы вложить часы геймплея с риском все похерить за минуты - велкам. При том в АРКе полно читеров. Обычно админы серваков стараются держать ситуацию под контролем, но, как правило, чем больше сервак, тем больше там импотентов.
Конечно, есть режим ПВЕ, где с вами ничего не сделают, но прикол в том,что при этом 30% из всех энграмм для вас будут просто бесполезны. Как только вы пройдете боссов и разведете живку, у вас просто не будет дел и игра вам наскучит, хотя это тоже приличное количество часов. 
ПЛЮСЫ
1. Бешеная реиграбельность. Игра в которой столько контента (10 огромных карт, только официальных и 480!! дино, большинство из которых вы можете приручить), что даже спустя 2к часов я нахожу в ней что-то новое. Я даже не всех боссов еще прошел. Она часто выбешивает, но к ней хочется возвращаться.
2. Очень веселая игра для компании. Игра очень сложная для новичков, но тем самым она создает бесконечное количество уникальных и смешных ситуаций, в которые весело попадать вместе. Серьезно, найдите кого-нибудь с кем могли бы играть и АРК откроется для вас по-новому. 
3. Красивая графика. Но нынешним стандартам она, конечно, не поражает воображение, но все же игра очень атмосферна и красива. Вы всегда будете любоваться красотой природы и упустите из вида раптора бегущего на вас сзади, будете бояться ночи и шарахаться от каждого громкого звука, а горящие в ночи глаза будут сниться вам в кошмарах. АРК умеет создавать много памятных моментов (большинство неприятных, правда).
В общем, подводя итог, скажу, что АРК - это игра которая либо затянет вас на сотни часов, либо вы ее рефандните не поиграв и двух. Ну и не лезьте в нее, если не готовы тратить много времени на игры. 
П.С. Не сносите бомжей, прошаренные, им и так непросто живется.

184116481.review:
[h1]ARK: Survival Evolved[/h1]

Después de más de [b]10.590 horas[/b] de juego en [b]ARK: Survival Evolved[/b], puedo decir que es una de las experiencias más profundas y gratificantes que he tenido en el mundo de los videojuegos, pero también tiene sus aspectos negativos que merecen ser destacados. A continuación, una reseña detallada con una valoración tanto positiva como negativa del juego:

[h2]Aspectos Positivos:[/h2]
[list]
[*]1. [b]Mundo Abierto y Exploración[/b]: [i]ARK[/i] ofrece un vasto mundo abierto lleno de diversidad, desde selvas frondosas hasta desiertos abrasadores, pasando por océanos y montañas nevadas. La exploración es una de las mayores fortalezas del juego, ya que cada rincón tiene algo nuevo por descubrir, ya sean criaturas, recursos o secretos ocultos. La sensación de estar en una isla primitiva, llena de dinosaurios y criaturas fantásticas, nunca pierde su atractivo.

[*]2. [b]Domesticar Dinosaurios[/b]: Uno de los mayores atractivos del juego es, sin duda, el sistema de domesticación de dinosaurios. La variedad es asombrosa, desde pequeños herbívoros hasta enormes depredadores. Cada criatura tiene su propio conjunto de habilidades y características, lo que ofrece un nivel profundo de estrategia y personalización. Poder montar a un T-Rex o volar sobre un Pteranodon es una sensación increíble, y la gestión de tu "parque jurásico" personaliza la experiencia aún más.

[*]3. [b]Supervivencia y Jugabilidad[/b]: El juego combina supervivencia con un sistema de progresión muy adictivo. Desde recolectar recursos, cazar, cocinar y construir, hasta gestionar tu salud y energía, todo fluye de manera natural. La sensación de progreso constante es uno de los mayores motores de *ARK*, lo que hace que quieras seguir jugando para mejorar tu equipo, tu base o tu tribu. Además, la jugabilidad cooperativa es una de las mejores que he experimentado. Formar tribus con amigos y colaborar para construir bases enormes o ir a aventuras juntos hace que el juego se vuelva aún más atractivo.

[*]4. [b]Actualizaciones y Expansiones[/b]: [i]ARK[/b] ha recibido numerosas actualizaciones y expansiones a lo largo de los años, muchas de las cuales han añadido contenido significativo, como nuevos mapas, criaturas y características. Los desarrolladores han demostrado un compromiso constante con la comunidad, lo que asegura que siempre haya algo nuevo que descubrir o mejorar.
[/olist]
 [h2]Aspectos Negativos:[/h2]
[list]
[*]1. [b]Curva de Aprendizaje Empinada[/b]: [i]ARK[/i] no es un juego fácil para los novatos. La curva de aprendizaje es increíblemente empinada, especialmente al principio, cuando debes aprender a gestionar tus recursos, domesticar criaturas y construir bases. Muchos jugadores nuevos se frustran por la falta de una guía clara o de tutoriales completos, lo que puede resultar en una experiencia abrumadora. El sistema de mecánicas también es bastante complejo y tiene muchas capas, lo que puede hacer que los nuevos jugadores se sientan perdidos en las primeras horas.

[*]2. [b]Problemas de Rendimiento[/b]: A pesar de las numerosas actualizaciones gráficas, [i]ARK[/i] sigue siendo un juego que puede ser exigente para tu PC, especialmente en mapas grandes o cuando hay muchos jugadores en el servidor. He experimentado caídas de FPS, problemas de latencia en servidores multijugador y, en general, la optimización del juego sigue siendo un área que podría mejorarse. Si bien la belleza del mundo es impresionante, los problemas de rendimiento pueden empañar la experiencia.

[*]3. [b]Grind y Progresión Lenta[/b]: Aunque la progresión es una de las mayores motivaciones para seguir jugando, a veces el grind puede volverse excesivo. Obtener recursos o domesticar ciertas criaturas puede llevar horas, lo que puede ser frustrante para los jugadores que prefieren una experiencia más dinámica. Además, el sistema de progresión es relativamente lento, lo que significa que el progreso hacia el final del juego puede sentirse estancado en algunos momentos.

[*]4. [b]PVP Desbalanceado y Problemas con la Comunidad[/b]: El componente multijugador de [i]ARK[/i] puede ser muy divertido, pero también presenta algunos desafíos. Los servidores PVP pueden ser muy desbalanceados, especialmente cuando las tribus más grandes o los jugadores con más experiencia dominan el juego. Las mecánicas de "raids" (ataques a bases) a menudo resultan en situaciones desmesuradas, y muchos jugadores se sienten frustrados por las constantes agresiones de otros jugadores. Además, la toxicidad en algunos servidores puede ser un problema, y la falta de moderación efectiva a veces hace que la experiencia sea menos agradable.
[/olist]
[h2]¿Lo recomendaría a otros?[/h2]

[i]Sí, lo recomendaría a los jugadores que disfrutan de la [b]supervivencia, la exploración y la construcción[/b], especialmente aquellos que tienen tiempo para sumergirse en un mundo tan vasto y complejo como el de [b]ARK[/b]. El juego tiene mucho que ofrecer, desde el desafío de la supervivencia hasta la emoción de montar un dinosaurio. La [b]cooperación[/b] con amigos o en tribus hace que la experiencia sea aún más rica. Sin embargo, debo advertir que no es un juego para quienes buscan algo casual o rápido. Si eres paciente, estás dispuesto a aprender y te gustan los juegos que requieren esfuerzo y dedicación, [b]ARK[/b] puede ser una de las mejores experiencias de juego de mundo abierto que puedes encontrar.

Por otro lado, si la [b]curva de aprendizaje[/b], los [b]problemas de rendimiento[/b] y la [b]competitividad de PVP[/b] son factores que te desmotivan, entonces tal vez *ARK* no sea para ti. Es un juego que puede resultar desafiante, pero también enormemente satisfactorio para quienes se adentran en él con la mentalidad correcta.

En resumen, [b]ARK: Survival Evolved[/b] es un juego con una [b]profundidad asombrosa[/b] y una [b]experiencia única[/b], pero que no está exento de dificultades. Para los que busquen un reto y disfruten de un juego de supervivencia con un gran componente de exploración, sin duda es altamente recomendable.[/i]

183961331.review:
ARK: Survival Evolved ou ASE, é simplesmente magnífico, outro jogo que joguei em outra plataforma, mas quando migrei pro pc não pude deixar de comprar para rejogar está obra prima.

Análise técnica:
Gráficos:9/10
História:3/10(não é o foco, e achei ruim)
Jogabilidade:9/10
Diversão:10/10
Dificuldade:7/10
Soundtrack: 100/10

O jogo é um jogo de sobrevivência, com dinossauros, ás vezes criaturas misticas, robôs ás vezes, diversas criaturas pré históricas, e um multiplayer muito divertido. Jogar com meus brothers, me trouxe diversas risadas, e momentos marcantes, o jogo em servidores oficiais é bem divertido também, pórem ark é um jogo com progressão lenta, exige muitas horas, farm e tempo dedicado. Mas felizmente, se for jogar só ou com amigos, você pode mudar as configurações mais acessíveis, o jogo é mais otimizado que o ASA, mas o ASA é superior em questão de opções e mods, mas o ASE não fica muito atrás, se quiser dar uma economizada, e ter um jogo muito bom para jogar com os amigos, ASE é uma ótima escolha. O jogo não erra no quesito aventura, os mapas são incríveis e totalmente diferentes, com particularidades únicas, os dinos também são incríveis, o jogo e tão imersivo que dá vontade de ter um casal de cada animal domável desta obra-prima. Um cheiro no butico e um beijo na teta esquerda.

nasci

183910777.review:
Казалось бы, игре столько лет, огромное количество отзывов, столько шума вокруг, а по факту она вышла как будто полгода назад. На эпических настройках отвратительная графика, перенасыщенная картинка, выкрученный на максимум контраст, от которого глаза лезут на лоб, особенно когда идешь по пляжу и видишь этот слепящий мокрый ярко-оранжевый песок. Меню настроек, как и сам интерфейс выглядят как в мобильной НН игре (надпись "Ваш персонаж достиг 1-го уровня" на половину экрана со шрифтом из пеинта меня порадовала). Сервера не ищет.

И вот это Г имеет 500 тысяч положительных отзывов? Ребята, пишущие, что игра создана двумя китайцами в подвалах провинции Хунь Сунь, вы абсолютно правы. Красивые здесь только текстуры, а при вгляде на все остальное просто тошнит.

183853445.review: Been a fan since 2017 I wanna say, I have over 50 days on console and this game has pretty much been my main game throughout the years for months at a time. So many memories have been made thanks to this game, and I cant think of a better sand box survival with dinosaurs. With that being said, this game could've been so much more. Absolutely zero support from the devs, with game breaking glitches never getting patched from day one, still remaining years later. As well as many complicated settings, that still somehow don't allow you to do what you want, often due to them affecting another aspect of the game negatively, more than it helped the original problem. In recent years, everything they do seems to be a shameless cash grab, all while providing something no one asked for. Overall, the original game is pretty fun, especially on the first play through of a map, if you can handle dying a lot and getting nowhere after hours of playing. Thank you for listening to my Ted talk.

183735211.review:
ARK: Survival Evolved es un juego de acción y supervivencia en un mundo abierto donde los jugadores deben sobrevivir en una isla plagada de dinosaurios, criaturas prehistóricas y otras amenazas. Desarrollado por Studio Wildcard, este título combina elementos de exploración, construcción, crafteo, y combate en un entorno hostil. A lo largo de su ciclo de vida, ha recibido varias actualizaciones y expansiones que han ampliado su jugabilidad y contenido, convirtiéndolo en uno de los títulos más complejos y ricos del género.

Historia y Contexto
El mundo de ARK es un enigma: los jugadores despiertan en una isla misteriosa sin recuerdos, rodeados de criaturas prehistóricas y una fauna peligrosa. La narrativa del juego se desarrolla a medida que los jugadores exploran, descubren los secretos de la isla, y buscan la forma de escapar de la trampa en la que están atrapados. A través de mensajes fragmentados, notas de supervivientes y objetos misteriosos, los jugadores empiezan a entender la historia detrás del enigma de la isla y las extrañas tecnologías que permiten la existencia de los dinosaurios y otras criaturas.

Jugabilidad
La jugabilidad de ARK es una mezcla de supervivencia pura y estrategia. Los jugadores deben recolectar recursos como madera, piedra y metales para fabricar herramientas, construir refugios y, eventualmente, edificar enormes bases. A medida que progresan, los jugadores pueden domesticar a dinosaurios y otras criaturas del mundo, lo que les permite montar, criar y utilizar estos animales en combate y exploración.

El sistema de combate es desafiante, ya que no solo se enfrentan a los dinosaurios, sino también a otros jugadores en el modo multijugador, lo que añade una capa extra de tensión y competencia. Además, las criaturas tienen una inteligencia artificial avanzada, lo que hace que la caza y la interacción con los animales sea realista y estratégica.

Supervivencia y Mundo Abierto

El juego cuenta con una gran variedad de biomas que van desde bosques tropicales hasta desiertos áridos y frías montañas nevadas. Cada zona tiene su propia fauna y flora, lo que obliga a los jugadores a adaptarse a diferentes condiciones de clima y supervivencia. La mecánica de hambre, sed, y la gestión de la salud corporal es crucial, ya que descuidarse puede llevar rápidamente a la muerte.

Uno de los aspectos más notables es la capacidad de personalización del personaje. Los jugadores pueden mejorar sus habilidades en áreas como la recolección de recursos, la construcción, el combate y la supervivencia. Esto permite que cada jugador tenga una experiencia única y personalizada.

Gráficos y Diseño Visual
El apartado visual de ARK: Survival Evolved es impresionante, especialmente en las ediciones más recientes, gracias a las mejoras gráficas y la optimización en consolas de nueva generación y PC. Los dinosaurios son extremadamente detallados y la ambientación del mundo abierto es vibrante y rica en texturas. Sin embargo, es importante señalar que en versiones anteriores y en consolas más antiguas, el rendimiento puede ser un problema, con caídas de frame rate y tiempos de carga largos.

Modos de Juego y Comunidad
ARK se ofrece principalmente en dos modalidades: jugador contra entorno (PvE) y jugador contra jugador (PvP). En PvE, los jugadores pueden colaborar para sobrevivir y construir, mientras que en PvP se enfrentan entre sí por recursos y control territorial. Además, el modo cooperativo permite que los jugadores formen tribus, lo que hace la experiencia aún más interesante al poder compartir recursos, domesticar dinosaurios juntos y defender sus bases.

La comunidad de ARK es masiva y muy activa. A lo largo de los años, se ha expandido en foros, servidores privados, y plataformas como Steam, donde los jugadores pueden compartir mods, herramientas y consejos para mejorar la experiencia de juego. Los servidores oficiales y privados ofrecen diferentes reglas y modos de juego, lo que permite una gran diversidad en cómo disfrutar de ARK.

Expansiones y Actualizaciones
Desde su lanzamiento, ARK: Survival Evolved ha recibido varias expansiones y actualizaciones importantes que agregan nuevos mapas, criaturas y mecánicas. Entre las expansiones más populares se encuentran Scorched Earth, Aberration, Extinction y Genesis, cada una con su propio mundo único, criaturas y desafíos. Estos DLCs han ampliado considerablemente el contenido del juego, manteniendo la base de jugadores enganchada y proporcionando horas extras de exploración y supervivencia.

Conclusión
ARK: Survival Evolved es un juego que desafía a los jugadores a sobrevivir en un mundo brutal y lleno de peligros, pero también les ofrece una sensación de logro inmensa cuando logran domar un dinosaurio o construir una base impenetrable. Si bien la curva de aprendizaje puede ser empinada y el rendimiento del juego puede variar, especialmente en consolas más antiguas, la experiencia de juego, especialmente en modo multijugador, es una de las más completas y emocionantes dentro del género de supervivencia.

El mundo abierto, la posibilidad de domesticar criaturas y la interacción constante entre los jugadores hacen que ARK sea un juego que recompensa la dedicación y la estrategia. Si eres fan de los juegos de supervivencia o de los dinosaurios, este título es una apuesta segura.

Puntos a favor:

Mundo abierto vasto y detallado.
Amplia variedad de criaturas para domesticar.
Multijugador competitivo y cooperativo.
Continuas actualizaciones y expansiones.
Gráficos y diseño visual impresionante.
Puntos en contra:

Curva de aprendizaje empinada.
Problemas de rendimiento en consolas antiguas.
Puede ser muy demandante en términos de tiempo y dedicación.
En resumen, ARK: Survival Evolved es un juego épico para aquellos que disfrutan de la supervivencia en mundos abiertos, el combate contra criaturas prehistóricas y la construcción de bases, pero también puede ser un desafío para aquellos que buscan una experiencia más casual.

183615146.review:
Gameplay
At its heart, ARK: Survival Evolved is a survival game with a twist—dinosaurs. Players find themselves stranded on a mysterious island, starting with nothing but their wits and an insatiable drive to survive. Gathering resources, crafting tools, and building shelters are key to enduring the harsh environment.

What sets ARK apart is its creature-taming system. From tiny Dodos to towering T-Rexes, nearly every creature on the island can be tamed, ridden, and even bred. These animals aren’t just companions; they’re essential to exploring the game’s expansive biomes, defending your base, and gathering resources efficiently.

The game’s progression system, which allows players to unlock advanced tools, weapons, and structures as they level up, keeps the gameplay loop engaging. Eventually, you’ll move from primitive tools to high-tech gear, creating an addictive sense of accomplishment.

World and Exploration
ARK’s world is vast, diverse, and stunning. Each biome, from dense jungles to arid deserts and snowy peaks, offers unique challenges and resources. The game encourages exploration, with hidden caves, underwater depths, and even floating islands waiting to be discovered.

The thrill of venturing into uncharted territory, unsure of what creatures or treasures await, is a core part of the game’s appeal. The ability to create your own path, set your own goals, and conquer the environment makes every session feel unique.

Multiplayer and Community
ARK truly shines in multiplayer. Whether teaming up with friends to build massive fortresses or competing against rival tribes in PvP, the social aspect adds a new layer of depth to the experience. However, solo players can still enjoy the game, thanks to customizable difficulty settings and AI-assisted companions.

The game’s vibrant modding community further enhances its replayability. Mods introduce new creatures, maps, and quality-of-life improvements, ensuring there’s always something fresh to try.

Challenges and Performance
ARK is not without its flaws. The game is notoriously demanding on hardware, and even powerful systems can struggle with optimization issues. Bugs and glitches, while less frequent than in the past, can still disrupt the experience.

That said, the developers have shown a commitment to improving the game over time, and many of these issues have been addressed through updates and patches.

Final Thoughts
ARK: Survival Evolved is a challenging and rewarding survival game that offers something truly unique. The combination of survival mechanics, dinosaur taming, and expansive exploration creates a one-of-a-kind adventure that’s hard to put down. While it has its rough edges, the sheer depth and creativity of the game make it a must-play for fans of the genre.

Rating: 9.5/10
